item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Ready.Player.One.2018.1080p.AMZN.WEB-DL.DDP5.1.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Ready Player One

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3

2 h 14 min • 2018

Description
When the creator of a virtual reality universe called the OASIS dies, he leaves his immense fortune to the first person to find a digital Easter egg he has hidden somewhere in the OASIS, sparking a contest that grips the entire world.

Directors: Steven Spielberg

Starring: Tye Sheridan, Olivia Cooke, Ben Mendelsohn
Studio: WARNER BROS.
